direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve checking the state of the collections within the composite.
Both methods iterate over the collections within the composite to perform their respective checks.
Both methods affect the state of the collections within the composite, though in different ways.
Both methods involve operations that can change the contents of the collections within the composite.
Both methods may throw UnsupportedOperationException if a CollectionMutator is not set.

enhanced_by.reason: Adding collections to the composite affects the state that isEmpty checks.
Clearing the collections affects the state that isEmpty checks.
The size method can be used to verify the state of the collections after calling isEmpty.
